1.title: Center for Policing Equity
1.subtitle: Your donation fuels our ability to lead on the police reform that's necessary. Together we will create a public safety system that protects and preserves justice for all.

1.title: Alaffia
1.subtitle:
Alaffia is an online Fair Trading company that specializes in soaps and beauty products. We aim to alleviate poverty and advance gender equality through the Fair Trade of indegenious resources and community empowerment projects.

Together, we’re cultivating beauty, equality and empowerment in West Africa and around the globe. Our women’s cooperatives in West Africa handcraft indigenous raw ingredients then the Alaffia team in Olympia, Washington creates the finished products. Alaffia returns the proceeds from the sale of these products to our communities to fund community empowerment and gender equality projects.

2.title: How colorism shapes our standards of beauty
2.subtitle: When Chika Okoro read the casting call for one of her favorite films, she noticed that actresses with darker skin were assigned lesser roles — prompting her to address a phenomenon she'd experienced all her life: colorism. In this eye-opening talk, Okoro shares coping strategies along with steps that could help eliminate this insidious and destructive mindset of discrimination.

3.title: Mojo Jojo Pickles
3.subtitle: Mojo Jojo Pickles was started in 2011 as a commercial venture of a Slow Food Edmonton Canning Bee project Johwanna "Jojo" Alleyne started in 2010. Mojo Jojo Pickles has expanded to include many creative acidified and spirited preserved foods from pickles to condiments, beverage syrups, and shrubs.

products.name: Popular Pickle Pack
products.description: A collection of our most popular pickles: kim chi style brussels sprout, traditional pickled carrot, pickled snow pea, and lemon balsamic asparagus.

products.name: Brandied Saskatoon Berries
products.description: Whole Alberta Saskatoons in a cane sugar and whisky syrup.  Great for breakfast, desserts and cocktails.

products.name: Gingerbread Apple Butter
products.description: These fruit butters are made by slow-cooking fruit and cane sugar until it forms a thick creamy paste. We then add real vanilla and spice to enhance these flavours. Great on toast or pancakes but Divine with fine cheese.

3.title: "I Have A Dream" Speech, In Its Entirety
3.subtitle: Listen to Martin Luther King, Jr.'s "I Have a Dream" speech.

4.title: The Honey Wine Company
4.subtitle: Inspired by his country's national beverage t'ej (honey wine), Ayele realized that these flowering trees were an ideal source of nectar and pollen that bees use to make valuable honey.  This set Ayele on a quest to better understand the art and business of creating honey wine.

products.name: Brut 750ml Honey Wine
products.description: The world standard for premium dry honey wine. Barrel aged in 100% French oak. Crisp, dry, and complex but with no bitter tannins.  Imbibers who enjoy drier cocktails or cider, pilsner style beers, and a variety of grape wine will appreciate versatile "Brut."

products.name: Demi Sec Sparkling 750ml Honey Wine
products.description: The world standard sweeter sparkling honey wine and the world’s first and only Charmat method honey wine (less yeasty and more ‘fruit forward’ than the Champagne method - most perfect for delicate honey wine - especially a sweeter honey wine).

products.name: Wancha (Grape Wine) 2016 Cabernet Sauvignon 750ml
products.description: Produced from certified organic grapes from North Ponderosa Vineyards in the Sierra Foothills, this 2017 Cabernet Sauvignon explodes with deep fruit flavors and aromas of plum, blackberry, and raisins. The silky smooth mouth feel ends with a dry, subtle, medium tannin finish. Aged for 14 Months in two year old French Oak Barrels (65%) and 35% New American Oak Barrels. Cellared and bottled in Sonoma County, 14% ABV.

4.title: Aloha Glamour
4.subtitle:
Aloha Glamour is a lifestyle movement that promotes women loving themselves wholeheartedly. We are a community of women that empower others to use find and use their voice to turn their tragedies into triumphs and their mess into a message which enables them to build from the inside out...seeing and LIVING in color again. 

Thanks to our inspiring collections and our impeccable customer service, we have been highly successful since day one. Browse through our site and check out the latest additions to our collection, and feel free to get in touch with our team if you need any assistance.

We want you to create a story in each and every Aloha Glamour piece that you wear. What's the color of your story?

5.title: Golde
5.subtitle: We're on a mission to make wellness easy, accessible and fun for all. To us, self-care means feeling like your best self. We believe that being well should feel good. That means products that fit seamlessly into your lifestyle, not the other way around.

products.name: Pure Matcha
products.description: Enjoy the ultimate green superfood in its purest form: matcha, made with 100% pure, shade-grown green tea leaves from Uji, Japan.

products.name: Papaya Bright Face Mask
products.description: This brightening mask is made with 100% pure, edible superfoods. Featuring superfruits like lucuma, papaya, and sea buckthorn berry, it's packed with vitamin C and smells like a tropical vacation.

products.name: Skin Hydration Ade
products.description: Sip + glow to support skin hydration with the power of superfoods.

5.title: It’s Nola
5.subtitle: Reimagined healthy granola snack bites rolled into a ball for easy snacking pleasure. Bold flavor to match our bold Brooklyn lifestyle.

6.title: Racism has a cost for everyone
6.subtitle: Racism makes our economy worse — and not just in ways that harm people of color, says public policy expert Heather C. McGhee. From her research and travels across the US, McGhee shares startling insights into how racism fuels bad policymaking and drains our economic potential — and offers a crucial rethink on what we can do to create a more prosperous nation for all.

6.title: Colorism in the Beauty Industry
6.subtitle: America has progressed tremendously over recent years in terms of racial inequality, but colorism remains to be seen on a global scale.

7.title: Natural Cuties
7.subtitle: Natural Cuties is a brand that promotes, encourages and highlights the beauty of African American hair in its natural state! #Iamanaturalcutie are you?

products.name: I am a Natural Cutie Book
products.description: Phoenix is excited about rocking her big afro puffs on the first day of Kindergarten. After hearing the other girls make fun of her puffs she is ready to go home. She will soon learn just what it means to be a NATURAL Cutie!

products.name: Drawstring Bag
products.description: Combine your love for vibrant prints and a sporty style with a cool drawstring bag. It’s a must-have gym essential that can be worn as a backpack with drawstring closure at top, and narrow, contrasting shoulder straps.

products.name: Mug
products.description: Whether you’re drinking your morning coffee, your evening tea, or something in between – this mug’s for you! It’s sturdy and glossy with a vivid print that’ll withstand the microwave and dishwasher.

7.title: Princess Planet
7.subtitle: Princess Planet is a brand of children's entertainment that helps promote characters with diverse hair textures, skin tones, and cultural backgrounds.

products.name: An Octet of Odes – Volume 1
products.description: An Octet of Odes Volume One is a compilation of poems that premiers eight unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun. All of the princesses’ stories are rooted in the realities of geography and history. They all reflect a love of learning and an appreciation for language, diversity, and culture.

products.name: An Octet of Odes – Volume 2
products.description: An Octet of Odes Volume Two is a compilation of poems that premiers eight unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun.

products.name: Princess Planet: Coloring book
products.description: The Princess Planet Coloring Book showcases sixteen unique characters from Princess Planet. Each character is imagined with both magic and realism. They are created in a world that is as scientific as it is colorful, adventurous, and fun. All of the princesses’ stories are rooted in the realities of geography and history. They all reflect a love of learning and an appreciation for language, diversity, and culture.

8.title: Big Mama's Sauce
8.subtitle: We believe that to be the best we must use only the best ingredients. This homemade recipe has been the highlight of our family gatherings since at least 2002…honestly Big Mama can’t even remember, that’s how long she been making it! Big Mama never liked store bought sauce and she wanted to serve only the best to her loved ones. So here we are…on the store shelf ironically! Lol…We hope you taste only love and enjoy just as our family has for all of these years!

8.title: Learn about Julius Jones
8.subtitle: Listen to the Jason Flom & Kim Kardashian West talk about Julius Jones’ story.

9.title: Juneteenth is a federal holiday. What comes next?
9.subtitle: As President Biden signed the Juneteenth National Independence Day Act into law, he acknowledged a current struggle for voting rights.

9.title: Revisionist History: Miss Buchanan’s Period of Adjustment
9.subtitle: Revisionist History is a podcast from Malcolm Gladwell and Pushkin Industries.In this episode: A landmark Supreme Court case. A civil rights revolution. Why has everyone forgotten what happened next?

10.title: Divided We Fall. Ignorant We Fail.
10.subtitle: This book is a non-fiction introspective of the country’s response to the first black President.

10.title: Plum Good
10.subtitle: Plum Good locally produces, discriminately sources and proudly brings to market the highest quality culinary and restorative spices, herbs and tea blends available. Our mission is to help bring flavorful nutrition available to our customers.  We make All Natural rubs and blends, teas, jams and sauces.

products.name: Paprika Lime Blend
products.description: This SALT FREE blend of citrus, paprika, garlic, and lime gives color, zest, and mouth watering flavor to fish, chicken, and poultry.

products.name: Organic Chai Tea
products.description: Black Tea, Ginger, Cardamom, Cloves, Peppercorns Cinnamon

products.name: Sweet & Hot Chocolate Sauce
products.description: A culinary gourmet delight for cooks and foodies alike! Choice serrano and chocolate peppers, dark chocolate, balsamic vinegar, raw sugar, cardamom and water make a mouthwatering marinade, topping or accompaniment and make everything it comes into contact with delicious.

11.title: Sha'Carri Richardson's drug test suspension is the end result of racist policies
11.subtitle: Sha’Carri Richardson should have been spending the next month preparing to win the Olympic gold medal in the 100-meter dash. She had a shot after blazing through the event’s qualifying race last month in under 11 seconds. Instead, Richardson may not get to run at all in Tokyo after failing a drug test taken during the Olympic trials in Oregon. But it wasn’t a performance-enhancer that was in her system: It was marijuana.

11.title: Justice For Tony McDade
11.subtitle: Tony McDade was a transgender black man who got killed by police in Tallahassee. Sign this petition and encourage others to do so as well to get his name out there.

12.title: Celebrating 10 African-American medical pioneers
12.subtitle: These trailblazers broke barriers and shattered stereotypes — and went on to conduct research, discover treatments, and provide leadership that improved the health of millions.

12.title: Pod Save the People Podcast
12.subtitle: On Pod Save the People, DeRay Mckesson explores news, culture, social justice, and politics with Sam Sinyangwe, Kaya Henderson and De’Ara Balenger. They offer a unique take on the news, with a special focus on overlooked stories and topics that often impact people of color.

13.title: Controversy over Confederate monuments is overdue
13.subtitle: As Confederate monuments and memorials are toppled across the United States, Stanford historian James T. Campbell says it is important to think historically not only about the past but also about our own time and what future generations might say about us.

13.title: Biased: Uncovering the Hidden Prejudice That Shapes What We See, Think, and Do
13.subtitle: With a perspective that is at once scientific, investigative, and informed by personal experience, Dr. Jennifer Eberhardt offers us the language and courage we need to face one of the biggest and most troubling issues of our time.

14.title: Double Dutch Dolls
14.subtitle: Through Fashion and Fun encourage young girls to explore and appreciate each other’s differences and similarities. Beauty comes in all shades and the brand seeks to create a community that celebrates the multicultural beauty of every child.

products.name: 18" African American Fashion Doll- Zaria Bradley
products.description: Hi! My name is Zaria Bradley. I am Kaila’s levelheaded, laidback twin-sister. My personal style is "classic cool". I’m into Soccer, Science, and keeping Kaila out of trouble, which is a huge job. I am in the 8th grade at Stylesboro Middle school. I am Captain of the Stingrays soccer team, President of the Science Club. I’ve got my future all planned out with a soccer scholarship, HBCU undergrad and med school.

products.name: 18" African American Fashion Doll- Kaila Bradley
products.description: Hi! My name is Kaila Bradley and I love fashion. I am the creative mind behind the Double Dutch Dolls hip style. A budding fashionista, I design all of our clothes and have plans to launch my own fashion line, named none other than "Double Dutch Dolls" in honor of me and my also fabulous sister, Zaria. I am in the 8th grade at Stylesboro Middle school and Co-captain of the Stingrays Cheerleading team.

products.name: Double Dutch Dolls Book 1- "Double Dare"
products.description: Navigating middle school can be tricky. But, 14-year old twins Kaila and Zaria Bradley, known to everyone as the Double Dutch Dolls, seem to have it all figured out.

14.title: Seven factors that contribute to American racism
14.subtitle: Of the seven factors the researchers identified, perhaps the most insidious is passivism or passive racism, which includes an apathy toward systems of racial advantage or denial that those systems even exist.

15.title: Free Minds Book Club
15.subtitle: Change lives today. Donate now to support incarcerated and formerly incarcerated youths and adults.

15.title: Seventh & Oak
15.subtitle: With self care as our inspiration and sustainability at the hearth of all our products, we craft every candle by hand and with a truckload of love from our home to yours in the hopes that they bring a little more warmth and coziness to your space.

products.name: Zen candle
products.description: When you light the Zen candle, think about how you feel when your space is consumed with good energy and positive thoughts. Burn the Zen candle when you want to cleanse your space to rid it of any negative energy and bring in all the good vibes.

products.name: Namaste candle
products.description: Relaxing lavender beautifully balanced with sweet ylang ylang and grassy vetiver in a recyclable glass jar. Enjoy some time in bed with a good book (or a Netflix show - who's judging?) before heading to bed for your beauty sleep. Just remember to blow it out before drifting off to dreamland.

products.name: Serenity candle
products.description: Fruity but not overpowering; very bright and fresh as each note distinguishes itself. Light up Serenity when you want to freshen up your entryways, kitchens and bathrooms.

16.title: Jungalow
16.subtitle: Black-owned home decor store selling furniture, bed and bath products, planters, and more.

products.name: Tigress Tangerine Rug by Justina Blakeney® X Loloi
products.description: Hooked of 100% wool pile, the Tigress Collection brings the wild to the home. Designed by Justina Blakeney by Loloi, the collection brings saturated colors and illustrative designs for a true conversation piece in any space.

products.name: Mary Jane Hook Pillow by Justina Blakeney
products.description: We love the bold contrasting colors of the teal leaf motif against the fresh peachy-orange. The square shape is easy to toss anywhere – a 'chill out chair', a cozy pillow pit on the floor... anywhere you imagine. Hint: This pillows makes for a rad gift for your mellow homies!

products.name: Peace Vase by Justina Blakeney®
products.description: Bold and colorful vessels with personality are kind of our thing here at Jungalow. These Peace Vases will add just the right amount of charm to your #shelfie. Fill with dried foraged flowers or fronds and display it as a sculptural focal point on your entryway table or mantle.

16.title: Microaggressions Matter
16.subtitle: They may not always be ill-intentioned, but the slights illuminate deeper problems in America.

17.title: Designs by Tee LLC
17.subtitle: Brooklyn Social Worker designing positive t-shirts and apparel. Supporting homeless children and families in NYC.

17.title: How to overcome our biases? Walk boldly toward them
17.subtitle: Our biases can be dangerous, even deadly — as we've seen in the cases of Michael Brown in Ferguson, Missouri, and Eric Garner, in Staten Island, New York. Diversity advocate Vernā Myers looks closely at some of the subconscious attitudes we hold toward out-groups. She makes a plea to all people: Acknowledge your biases.

18.title: Diva By Cindy
18.subtitle: Diva is for a woman who wants: Beauty, Excellence and Elegance in her hair. "DIVA" stands for: Divine, Inspired, Virtuous and Annointed. Thank you for using Diva by Cindy... the secret to Longer, Healthier Hair.

products.name: Super-Gro Haridress
products.description: Apply to scalp and temples for thinning hair to promote optimal hair growth. It tingles promoting circulation and healthy hair. Contains Shea Butter, Horse Tail, Menthol and Chamomile. Dry, Itchy, Flaky scalp is a thing of the past.

products.name: Leave-In Detangling Conditioner
products.description: The DIVA BY CINDY Leave-In Detangler eliminates dryness, brittleness, and limpness; and is especially good on over processed, dull hair. Penetrates the hair shaft quickly while detangling and adding sheen making it excellent for fine, limp hair and ideal for wraps and roller sets.

products.name: KURL POP Curl Hydration
products.description: This Leave in formula will leave your curls soft, moisturized and bouncy. Great on all curl types, can be used to define curls, twist and reactivate curls.

18.title: Book: The Global Beauty Industry
18.subtitle: Colorism, Racism, and the National Body

19.title: 26 King Wavy Merch, LLC
19.subtitle: All of our quality brushes are great brushes! They aren't just great for 360 waves. They, too, promote healthy hair in men, women and children, as well as healthy beards.

products.name: Premium Long Handle Brush
products.description: Medium-Hard Brush. This brush is made with nylon bristles and is great for waves, wolfing and natural hair.

products.name: Baby Blue Compression Cap
products.description: Our 2-6 King Wavy Wave Cap is designed to give the ultimate compression. Combined with any of our durags to achieve your maximum 360, 540, 720 wave potential.

products.name: Navy Blue Silk Durag
products.description: Designer Silk Durag

19.title: Hoodietowel
19.subtitle: Super soft, absorbent microfiber towel. Sized just right for optimal flexibility 100% cotton. Machine wash. Imported

20.title: Martin Luther King, Jr: 7 Surprising Facts
20.subtitle: In his 39 years (1929-1968) Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. became one of the leading figures in the civil rights movement.

20.title: Raycon
20.subtitle: Raycon is built around the mission that everyone deserves to enjoy great audio. We believe amazing audio experiences inspire go-getters around the world and power their everyday lives.

products.name: The Everyday Earbuds
products.description: Our most compact wireless earbuds for your everyday grind. Designed to deliver more powerful sound than any earbuds of its size.

products.name: The Everyday Headphones
products.description: With booming sound and superior noise cancellation, you can block out all distractions and stay focused on your mission.

products.name: The Fitness Belt
products.description: A nifty and lightweight belt to fuel your workouts. Hold your smartphone, Raycon earbuds, and other daily essentials for your run or gym sessions.

21.title: Racist abuse directed at England players after Euro 2020 final
21.subtitle: The online racial abuse of some England players following Sunday's Euro 2020 final defeat by Italy has been described by the team's manager Gareth Southgate as "unforgivable" and "just not what we stand for." Marcus Rashford, Jadon Sancho and Bukayo Saka were targeted on social media after they missed penalties in the 3-2 shootout defeat at Wembley Stadium.

21.title: Justice for Tete Gulley
21.subtitle: Tete Gulley was a 31 year old queer Black transient. She was also known by some of her family as Otis. She was found hanging from a tree on the evening of May 27th 2019 in Rocky Butte Park. The cause of death was determined to be suicide at the scene but there is evidence of foul play.

22.title: Abolish Prison Labor in the USA
22.subtitle: Prison labor is a form of modern American slavery used by multiple large corporations across the world. Under the 13th Amendment to the United States Constitution, slavery was merely reformed rather than abolished. Racial justice in the USA cannot be achieved until prison labor is abolished completely.

22.title: How we can make racism a solvable problem — and improve policing
22.subtitle: When we define racism as behaviors instead of feelings, we can measure it — and transform it from an impossible problem into a solvable one, says justice scientist Dr. Phillip Atiba Goff. In an actionable talk, he shares his work at the Center for Policing Equity, an organization that helps police departments diagnose and track racial gaps in policing in order to eliminate them.

23.title: Swimming caps designed for natural hair banned from Tokyo Olympic Games
23.subtitle: Swimming caps designed for natural Black hair — and created by a Black-owned company — will not be allowed at the upcoming Olympic Games in Tokyo. The International Swimming Federation said the caps do not follow "the natural form of the head," British brand Soul Cap told BBC News.

23.title: When the first all-black professional basketball team dominated...back in the ’20s
23.subtitle: "They were literally pioneers and recognized that they were making a statement in front of the audiences."

24.title: Sienna Sauce
24.subtitle: The award winning Sienna Sauce comes in 3 delicious flavors for every palette. Tangy (the original flavor), Lemon Pepper and Spicy. The Lemon Pepper and Spicy flavors are made with the original flavor being the base of those Sauces. Sienna Sauce has WOWed so many customers, the family based company had to create a subscription program so the Sienna Sauce addicts wouldn’t run out of their favorite sauces.

products.name: Sienna Sauce Variety Pack
products.description: This gourmet sauce has No High Fructose Corn Syrup and is Gluten-Free. It combines the perfect blend of sweet with a hint of tangy serving as a perfect complement to chicken, pork, beef, or seafood that has been fried, smoked, baked, or grilled.

products.name: Sienna Sauce 3 Pack
products.description: This gourmet sauce has No High Fructose Corn Syrup and is Gluten-Free. It combines the perfect blend of sweet with a hint of tangy serving as a perfect complement to chicken, pork, beef, or seafood that has been fried, smoked, baked, or grilled.

products.name: Digital Sauce Lovers E-Book
products.description: Sienna Sauce has released its first e-cookbook! This digital flavor manual has 4 amazing recipes by celebrity chef, Jabril Riddick, Along with the champion recipe from Sienna Sauce's Virtual Cook-Off.

24.title: Taste by Dannie K
24.subtitle: Taste by Dannie K is a black-owned lingerie company dedicated to the empowerment of women of all shades and sizes. It is our mission to help women realize that they are powerful beyond measure & that they don't have to tone down their super power of sexy to be taken seriously.

25.title: Ka'oir Fitness
25.subtitle: Ka'oir Fitness, founded in 2011 by celebrity Keyshia Ka'oir is a fitness line of patented, trademarked fat burners to help people lose weight faster than ever.

products.name: Ka'oir Waist Eraser™
products.description: Ka'oir Waist Eraser™ will have your waist, stomach & back looking amazing. This is a unisex fitness product which burns belly & back fat, sheds excess water and shrinks waist size....all while allowing your abs to be more visible. It allows you to spot train your stomach, back  & waist.

products.name: Ka'oir Body Sweat™
products.description: The Ka'oir Body Sweat is a state of the art "sweat" suit. It is very stretchy, flexible & comfortable for any workout. KA'OIR Body Sweat will make you sweat tremendously, your metabolism will increase, you will burn calories, lose weight & shed water!

products.name: Ka'oir Slimming Tea
products.description: KA’OIR Slimming Tea is a loose leaf tea packed in individual nylon tea bags that contains a powerful blend of natural ingredients to help slim your body! Each package includes 14 bags (78.4 grams) of detox tea, and is meant to be used every day or every other day.

25.title: Racial Literacy: What Does it Mean?
25.subtitle: What is your first memory of racial difference? Unfortunately, our education system doesn’t include a standard explanation to our young people of the history of the creation of the concept of race (or critical race theory). Learn today what you should've in school.

26.title: TGEU International Women’s Day - Inclusivity Media Statement
26.subtitle: On the occasion of the International Women’s Day (IWD) on 8 March, TGEU joins the voices of trans people around the world in denouncing oppression, violence, and hate against women and non-binary people in all spheres of life.

26.title: The Hate U Give
26.subtitle: Based on the best-selling novel, The Hate U Give tells the story of Starr Carter, who lives in two worlds: the poor, black neighborhood where she resides and the mostly white prep school she attends. This uneasy balance is shattered when she witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood friend by a policeman. Facing pressures from all sides, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what’s right.

27.title: Can the Beauty Industry Confront Colorism?
27.subtitle: The beauty industry has been trying to productively confront racism. Can it do the same with colorism, where lighter-skinned models are favored over those with darker skin?

27.title: Olamina Botanicals
27.subtitle: We are a Black femme-owned apothecary crafting tinctures, teas, syrups and salves in unceded Lenni Lenape territory. Our mission is to help people ground into their own innate power as healers, draw strength from the plant world—and act on behalf of the planet.

products.name: Fire Cider - Immune Tonic
products.description: Fire Cider is a spicy, garlicky, alcohol-free folk immunity remedy that can be taken daily to ward off the sniffles.

products.name: Sore Throat Spray
products.description: Tingle and tickle the microorganisms responsible for your sore throat into oblivion with our Sore Throat Spray.

products.name: Sweet Dreams - Sleep Tonic
products.description: Formulated to help one ease into peaceful slumber, Sweet Dreams features reputed nervine Hops, a sedative that induces deep sleep without headache or groggy feeling upon waking.

28.title: Why Protests and Riots Work
28.subtitle: Riots are destructive, dangerous, and scary — but can lead to serious social reforms. To prevent more violent uprisings and protests, we need to take their causes seriously.

28.title: Red Bay Coffee
28.subtitle: Red Bay Coffee is at the forefront of what we believe is the fourth wave of coffee—a firm commitment to ensure coffee production is not only high quality and sustainable, but a vehicle for diversity, inclusion, social and economic restoration, entrepreneurship, and environmental sustainability. We are foodies, artists, activists, community folk, and innovators who love, love, love what we do.

products.name: East Fourteenth
products.description: Tanzanian Dark Roast - Blackberry, Dark Chocolate, Date  East Fourteenth is an homage to a past heritage and a link to history in the making. It is the story of Oakland’s wide-reaching cultures and creeds.

products.name: Coffee Mug - Africa's Gift (Black)
products.description: "Coffee Africa's Gift to the World" Coffee Mug - beautiful, stylish, black-on-black design with Red Bay Coffee logo - 12 ounces

products.name: Unisex Sweatshirt - Black Coffee - Black
products.description: Crewneck Sweatshirt - black with black foil print; back Red Bay Coffee logo; 80/20 Poly-Cotton Blend. Locally sourced and screen printed in Oakland, CA.

29.title: What Anti-racist Teachers Do Differently
29.subtitle: They view the success of black students as central to the success of their own teaching. Read more from Pirette McKamey, principal of San Francisco’s Mission High School and an anti-racist educator for more than 30 years.

29.title: Did you really just say that?
29.subtitle: Here's advice on how to confront microaggressions, whether you're a target, bystander or perpetrator

30.title: Juneteenth Challenges A Narrative About America’s History
30.subtitle: Juneteenth marks the day in 1865 when Union troops arrived in Galveston, Texas, and the enslaved people living there learned of their freedom — more than two years after President Abraham Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation. As such, the day tells a broader story of how emancipation was woefully delayed for Black people enslaved deep in the Confederacy.

30.title: Sade Baron
30.subtitle: Sade and Rachel are a mother-daughter duo creating high-performance body care products that make your skin feel great. As a 100% woman-owned business, they select every ingredient in their products. Everything is handmade, carefully packaged, and personally checked for impeccable quality.

products.name: Body Care Set 1 - Normal Skin
products.description: The essentials kit features everything you need to keep maintain your skin health. Start with a new skinfood routine and feed it nutrient-rich superfoods all day, every day.

products.name: Go Clean Starter Kit | Body Care Set
products.description: With this Go Clean Body Care Starter Set you can finally remove excessive ingredients and chemicals from your daily body care routine. With Sade Baron, all of our products are 100% vegan, made with clean ingredients to work for most skin types, so you can trust that you'll find great products to work for you.

products.name: Fragrance Free Body Wash
products.description: A light face and body wash suitable for everyday use. This fragrance-free body wash is perfect for babies, children and adults with reactive and sensitive skin. With superfats galore like avocado oil, olive oil and more, this liquid castile soap will leave your skin hydrated day after day.

31.title: Fewer Cards
31.subtitle: Fewer Cards is a touchless smart card that allows you to express yourself and share who you are with others by exchanging contact information, social media, and data seamlessly. The concept of Fewer Cards started from the fact that exchanging paper business cards is wasteful and cumbersome.

31.title: Kids Swag
31.subtitle: Great action is taking place to improve diversity in books and dolls and there are a number of different vendors making it easier to find these great items. But what about everything else in your child's world? You go grocery shopping, what image is on the cute plate and cup set your child wants? You're want to encourage their creativity, what images are in their colouring books? You're throwing a birthday party, what are your options?
31.moreInfo: The list can go on and on. It is an unnecessarily complicated task to source and purchase everyday lifestyle products for children that have black images. These companies exist but one must be internet savvy and social media literate to find them. KIDS SWAG was launched in December 2016 to make it easy for parents to build environments that are reflective of their child's beauty.

products.name: Nia Ballerina Backpack
products.description: This beautifully illustrated pink rucksack is the perfect accessory for your little ballerina, which is both lightweight and practical with plenty of storage. Made from durable and water-resistant material this rucksack features a colourful design with two images of Nia Ballerina on the front.

products.name: Nana Yaa
products.description: Nana means Queen or King in West Africa , Ghana. The founders of Nana Dolls wanted to teach the younger generation of their history whilst also having fun. There were many strong courageous women from all over Africa who helped to fight for freedom.

products.name: Super Friends Onesie
products.description: Your little Superhero featured as your favourite Superhero.
